verses.name: Isaiah 7:6
verses.text: Let us go up against Judah, and vex it, and let us make a breach therein for us, and set a king in the midst of it, even the son of Tabeal:

verses.name: Isaiah 7:7
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God, It shall not stand, neither shall it come to pass.

verses.name: Isaiah 7:8
verses.text: For the head of Syria is Damascus, and the head of Damascus is Rezin; and within threescore and five years shall Ephraim be broken, that it be not a people.
